Detailed Description

template<typename T>
class cds::details::Comparator< T >

Comparator.

Comparator is a functor (a class with binary operator() ) that compares two values. The comparator is based on std::less<T> functor and returns the result of comparing of two values:

  • -1 if a < b
  • 0 if a == b
  • 1 if a > b

Member Function Documentation

template<typename T >
int cds::details::Comparator< T >::operator() ( const T &  p1,
const T &  p2 
) const [inline]

Compare method.

Returns:
-1 if p1 < p2
0 if p1 == p2
1 if p1 > p2
